description: This file contains utility functions for a Streamlit-based web application, including session message handling, sidebar widget rendering, JSON validation, tool call display, and agent restart logic. It also imports external modules and internal models/logging utilities.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the Streamlit session state messages list, including role, content, and optional tool calls.

methods.name: sidebar_widget
methods.description: Renders a sidebar with configuration options, sample queries, and chat controls for the Streamlit app.

methods.name: about_widget
methods.description: Displays an about section in the sidebar with links to GitHub, documentation, and community channels.

methods.name: is_json
methods.description: Checks if a given string is valid JSON.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays a list of tool call results within a Streamlit container, with expandable sections for details.

methods.name: restart_agent
methods.description: Resets the agent state and clears chat history, then triggers a rerun of the Streamlit app.
